com.group13.queries

Class Creator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group13.queries.Creator

  • public class Creator
extends java.lang.Object
    A creator represents a contributor to the database.

    To use this class, it must be given a User. This User must be a Creator, or it will be rejected.
    Author:
    Conner Theberge

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Creator(User user)
      Constructs a Creator with the given User.

      Gets all media created by this Creator

      • Creator

        public Creator(User user)

    • Method Detail

      • registerCreator

        public static boolean registerCreator(User user,
                                      java.lang.String bankRouting,
                                      java.lang.String bankAccNumber)
        Registers a new creator in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who is the creator
        bankRouting - The bank routing number for this creator
        bankAccNumber - The bank account number for this creator
        Returns:
        Whether the registering was successful

      • deleteCreator

        public static boolean deleteCreator(User user)
        Deletes a creator from the database.

        Does NOT delete the user account, just the creator account.
        Parameters:
        user - The user who is the creator to delete
        Returns:
        Whether the deletion was successful

      • deleteCreator

        public static boolean deleteCreator(Creator creator)
        Deletes a creator from the database.

        Does NOT delete the user account, just the creator account.
        Parameters:
        creator - The creator to delete
        Returns:
        Whether the deletion was successful
